solution_line_template: New York is {ny_fraction}*{new_england_population} = <<{ny_fraction}*{new_england_population}={new_york_population}>>{new_york_population} people living in New York.
The combined population of both states is {new_york_population}+{new_england_population} = <<{new_york_population}+{new_england_population}={combined_population}>>{combined_population}
